channel.title: Apple Pay Promo on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Apple Pay Promo on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Add $25 to Apple Account Balance, Get 2 Months Free Apple Music
item.description: Apple has an upcoming promotion that gives users up to two months of free Apple Music when they add funds to their Apple Account balance, according to code found by MacRumors contributor Aaron Perris.
